div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 992 Kozyrka (formerly Malaia Derekleia), just N of Parutino, Ochakov raion, Niko- laev oblast, Ukraine, 1960-1966 Burial: late 6th-5th cent. B.C. Contents: 120+ AE. In amphora Olbia: fish-shaped AE (anepigraphic) Disposition: Mus. of the Olbia Exc.? Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
